title: SMC_GSentence (Struct)
text:
TYPE SMC_GSentence : STRUCT
Represents one sentence of a G-Code file

rows.Name: pos
rows.Comment: The source-position of the start of the sentence

rows.Name: nNumGWords
rows.Comment: The number of G-words (stored in the G-Word queue)

rows.Name: nNumGExpTokens
rows.Comment:
The summed number of g-expression tokens for all G-words of
the sentence

rows.Name: lenAddData
rows.Comment:
The summed additional data size fro all g-expression tokens
of the sentence

rows.Name: bStepSuppress
rows.Comment: Whether the sentence starts with â/â
